page.title: 17Leisure in Woodplumpton.
page.content: Many of the local people attend various activities.The bowling club is popular both with men and women.The Women's Institute provides another intrest for many between the age of 50 to 75 years. The over 60's meet in the youth club. The local shop and Post Office is visited by the majority of locals.Many come to the post office for pensions and family allowances.Holidays are popular,people travel long distances for sunshine and a rest.Many villagers are skillful gardeners who produce flowers and vegetables much of which is sent to the church.The older people like to live in the village where it is quiet and friendly.The younger generation like to visit the local where life is fast and has more interesting things to offer in the way of entertainment.
